metadata.title: CVE-2016-3771 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The MediaTek drivers in Android before 2016-07-05 on Android One devicesallow attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka Androidinternal bug 29007611 and MediaTek internal bug ALPS02703102.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
